Description_lang: Hurls bombs, creating burning orbs that slowly travel down the walkway. Coming into contact with a flaming orb inflicts $s1 Fire damage and reducing movement speed by $s2% for $d. When Imonar enters a lethal stance, these orbs burn for an additional $250191s3 Fire damage every $250191t3 sec for $250191d.The intermission ends when $@spellname248321 is interrupted.Imonar the Soulhunter takes $248233s2% less damage while channeling this effect.
